name: nara
description: Nara is a high-performance TypeScript web framework combining HyperExpress, Svelte 5, and Inertia.js. Features include type-safe routing, comprehensive security (CSRF, rate limiting, login throttling), structured logging with Pino, graceful shutdown, and a powerful CLI with 21+ commands for scaffolding, database management, and project health checks.

scripts.dev: clear && rm -rf dist && rm -rf build && npx concurrently 'vite'  'sleep 1 && npx nodemon --legacy-watch'
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/views && cp -rf resources/views/* dist/views && vite build && tsc && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json && cp -rf dist build && cp -rf public build
scripts.test: echo 'No test framework configured. Install vitest or jest to run tests.'

author: MasRama
